name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing high-performance solutions leveraging **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. My skill set includes strong expertise in serverless architectures, including **EKS** and **SQS**, as well as experience with databases like **MongoDB**. I am proficient in implementing billing systems such as Credit Card Processing, Usage-Based Billing, Invoicing, and Sales Tax which ensure the seamless operation of our financial platforms.
I have led projects that integrate cutting-edge technologies and methodologies to build secure applications compliant with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My strengths lie in problem-solving and effective communication, ensuring successful teamwork and project outcomes. I have hands-on experience with AI/ML integration for servers, adept at crafting machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enhancing real-time data processing capabilities.
